trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo di gestione dell'evento <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to an <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> viene utilizzata per specificare i metodi che vengono richiamati in risposta a un <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate an instance of <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> with an event, add the instance to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare un'istanza di <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> con un evento, aggiungere l'istanza per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The methods referenced by the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> are invoked whenever an assembly is loaded, until the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is removed from the event.
trans-unit.target: I metodi a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> vengono richiamati ogni volta che un assembly viene caricato, finch√© il <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> viene rimosso dall'evento.
